Description: Schecter C-1 Diamond Series Guitar Duncan PU Neck Through Sunburst Up for sale we have a Schecter guitar. It’s very clean and has super stylish retro look to it. Way ahead of its time. The guitar plays well, intonation is low. The electronics, switches, picks ups and everything works as it should. Overall the guitar is in very good condition, and there are a handful of random small superficial dings on the entire guitar. Very loud guitar that sounds amazing through any decent amplifier. ConditionDescription: Bring out the secret of Jerry Horton from Papa Roach in the open with the c-1 Elite electric guitar. The abalone binding on body and neck of this Schecter electric guitar provides it a rock solid design. Moreover, this Schecter guitar with 24 Jumbo frets and a scale of 25 Â½ inch ensures an amazing sound. The TonePros TOM (Tune-O-Matic O-Matic) type of bridge and Duncan designed humbuckers on this Scheter electric guitar keep up the individual sound quality. The Flamed maple top, Mahogany body, Rosewood fretboard and a Maple neck and body on this Schecter guitar makes it an absolute delight in the first look.
